Description: TCP/IP SystemVerilog SHUNT An example of client-server functions-Initiator(server)

This example implements a server that accepts client connections and demonstrates comprehensive transaction handling including headers, data headers, and various data types such as integer vectors, double vectors, and string data in a loopback testing environment.
